toleranceExplanation: Lowering this limit decreases your risk of frontrunning. However, this makes more likely that your transaction will fail due to normal price movements.
addLiquidityHelpTips: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
removeLiquidityHelpTip: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.

expertModeContent: Expert mode turns off the confirm transaction prompt and allows high slippage trades that often result in bad rates and lost funds.
